text:
早く
スケア
食事が
冷める!
style: font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 12.61%;top: 2.20%;width: 8.30%;height: 12.26%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 30%;

text:
食事
行かなきゃ
エイフェン
明日話そう

font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 60.21%;top: 4.40%;width: 5.85%;height: 5.03%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

text:
おいで
一緒に
手紙
読みましょ
style: font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 19.95%;top: 26.81%;width: 10.43%;height: 11.64%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

font-size: 20px;color: white;background-color: white;left: 29.95%;top: 44.03%;width: 9.36%;height: 3.54%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 35%;font-weight: bold;text-shadow: black 2px 0px,  black -2px 0px, black 0px -2px, black 0px 2px, black 2px 2px , black -2px 2px, black 2px -2px, black -2px -2px, black 1px 2px,  black -1px 2px, black 1px -2px, black -1px -2px, black 2px 1px,  black -2px 1px, black 2px -1px, black -2px -1px;

text:
ミス
オルセン
あなたの
息子は
8才になり
style: font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 46.86%;top: 26.73%;width: 9.04%;height: 17.14%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

text:
大いなる
ママンの
テストを
受けます
style: font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 84.79%;top: 27.83%;width: 9.68%;height: 12.81%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

text:
テストは
口頭面接で
準備は
不要です
style: font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 84.57%;top: 40.64%;width: 11.06%;height: 13.92%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 4.89%;top: 59.28%;width: 10.32%;height: 9.67%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

text:
招集で
かかる
じがんは
style: font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 19.79%;top: 62.50%;width: 9.47%;height: 11.64%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 5.64%;top: 75.08%;width: 7.34%;height: 4.72%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

text:
時間は
人に
よりますが
約1時間程です
style: font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 21.81%;top: 78.54%;width: 9.36%;height: 10.06%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;

text:
あなたの
お子さんは
能力や
異なる姿を
得ますが
style: font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 42.45%;top: 58.02%;width: 14.26%;height: 15.64%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;

text:
それに
ついては
招集後に
別の手紙を
送ります
